pages.text: This portal can only be lit in the Thermospherical Dimension, and will take the player to the End to begin the Fourth boss fight.$(br)This portal is made from "Thermospherical End Portal Frames"

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Heated Crystal Tablet"
This portal can only be lit in the Thermospherical Dimension, and will take the player to the Thermospherical Nether$(br)This portal is made from "Thermospherical Nether Portal Frames"

pages.name: End Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using a $(item)"Bucket of Lava"
This portal can only be lit in the Thermospherical Dimension, and will take the player back to the Stratospherical Dimension.$(br)This portal is made from "Thermospherical Portal Frames"

pages.name: Return Portal
pages.text: This portal frame must be lit using the $(item)"Green Dragon Essence"
